data.partBlankContent: Samantha is a hairdresser at a local salon. She spe___ all d__ giving peo___ haircuts, and some_____ she dy__ or sty___ hair. She li___ the wo__, b__ her ba__ and fe__ hurt a_ the e__ of t__ day. At least when she is dying hair she is able to sit down for a bit.
data.fullContent: Samantha is a hairdresser at a local salon. She spends all day giving people haircuts, and sometimes she dyes or styles hair. She likes the work, but her back and feet hurt at the end of the day. At least when she is dying hair she is able to sit down for a bit.
data.answer: 萨曼莎是当地一家美容院的美发师。她整天给人理发，有时还染发或做发型。她喜欢这份工作，但一天下来，她的背和脚都疼了。至少当她染发时，她能坐下来一会儿。
